definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (my father is Nêr, or is a lamp cf. 2Sa 21:17; acc. to Lag:BN 75 = [[אֲבֶן]] (= [[בֶּן]]) + [[נֵר]] = son of Ner; cf. LXX )Abennhr)—so only 1Sa 14:50, elsewh. [[אַבְנֵר]]—cousin of Saul, and captain of his host 1Sa 14:50, 1Sa 14:51, 1Sa 17:55, 1Sa 17:55, 1Sa 17:55 + 52 t. 1 & 2 S + 1Ki 2:5, 1Ki 2:32, 1Ch 26:28, 1Ch 27:21.
